Job Description

Overview / Advertisement
Eleven Experience is rapidly expanding its operations in the North Patagonia region. We are looking for creative, passionate, flexible and collaborative team members who are willing to do whatever it takes to accomplish the tasks at hand. Our current operations are Rio Palena Lodge and Martin Pescador Lodge. Learn more at www.elevenexperience.com.

We are currently seeking candidates for our Experience Manager position. This is a seasonal position and this position is responsible for managing and planning guest and employee logistics to and from properties. The ideal candidate is organized, hardworking, enthusiastic, and a strong multitasker. The candidates have to live in Palena during the season. We are looking for candidates ideally with previous experience in tourism and/or travel agencies.

This vacancy is a management-level position that requires strong administrative skills, project management experience, and the ability to work productively and independently.

Position Purpose
Create and execute once in a lifetime experiences for guests visiting the property by planning intricate and dynamic itineraries to exceed expectations to the best of your ability
Clearly communicate with guests before, during, and after their trip to tailor their experience with Eleven and to help secure return business
Liaise clearly and calmly with all necessary members of the Eleven and all the company’s involved.
Behave as a leader within the Eleven hospitality team and encourage and support the team to deliver the Eleven product to the highest possible standard everyday
Work to further the Eleven product by questioning operational norms, proposing solutions, and striving to innovate and streamline the Eleven operation in Chile.

Responsibilities/Duties/Functions/Tasks
Manage the Eleven guest experience by working externally with clients and internally with the operations teams
Communicate in person, by email, and over the phone with all parties relating to a guest trip including but not limited to the guest, the guest’s personal assistant, travel agents, etc.
Maintain strong relationships with guests throughout their stay and after departure
Serve as a guest liaison ensuring that all guest preferences are in order for their visit. Work closely with the Lodge Manager to communicate guest needs with the team
Complete all trip follow up work in a timely manner. This includes invoices, trip reports, shipping luggage, etc.
Extensive use of SalesForce, Opera, Micros, Intelligenz and the PPM, or any other CRM or business management tools, to best track guest preferences, trip details, payment, etc.
Accurately communicate tips for hospitality staff once a guest has paid
Maintain all operational Drive folders in an organized manner with all pertinent client data
Track and submit all invoices to accounts payable that relate to a guest’s stay
Assist the Eleven Sales Team by providing logistical details and support that may help execute sales
Manage guest’s expectations appropriately

Qualifications
Microsoft Office Suite – specifically Microsoft Excel
Sophisticated email communication skills
SalesForce

Preferences
Ability to deliver high quality work in a dynamic, fast-paced, sometimes loud work environment
Flexible team player willing to do anything to complete the Eleven team goals
Solution Oriented
Personable, outgoing, friendly
Sophisticated
Thrives under pressure
High ethical standards
Confident
Willing to work specifically to meet guest needs – early mornings and late evenings if need be

Work Requirements
Valid driver’s license Class B
Flexible work schedule
Ability to sit at a desk and type at a computer for extensive periods of time
Live in Palena during the season (September-April)
English level: advanced (Listening, Speaking, Reading)

Start date: September 1st

Empresa experta en servicios para la medicina y gastronomía, se encuentra en búsqueda de una o un gestor senior, con el objetivo de organizar y coordinar labores administrativas involucradas en el proceso de habilitación y regularización de negocios en municipios, seremi salud, cuidando estratégicamente la relación con los clientes.

Características del trabajo
Trabajo enfocado a objetivos y regularizaciones en terreno.
No esta sujeto a horario, ni supervisión directa. Son asesorias enfocadas a objetivos.
Si es sumamente necesario partir temprano la jornada laboral, requisito excluyente, por las municipalidades y seremi salud.

Funciones especificas
1 Generar programa y coordinacion de tareas semanales para cumplir con los servicios vendidos.
2 Realizar seguimiento diario del programa.
3 Generar seguimiento diario de las regularizaciones y permisos de los proyectos en seremi salud, municipalidades, sag y organismos reguladores.
4 Cumplir con los plazos y acuerdos con los clientes, respecto de la ejecución de los proyectos a su cargo.
5 Comunicar semanalmente a jefatura los resultados, avances, observaciones y propuestas de soluciones a los proyectos.
6 Coordinar con el clientes las actividades de regularización y documentos necesarios.
7 Ejecutar las etapas del proceso de regularización de los proyectos en seremi, municipalidad y organismos reguladores.

Recibirás capacitaciones técnicas y apoyo constante en estos procesos.
